announcements.tradingGloballyDisabled: THORChain 目前网络不稳定。团队正在进行调查。

pendingLiquidity.content: 待定中的添加流动性交易需要补缺对称添加%{asset}来完成
pendingLiquidity.pendingInfoGeneral: 待定中的添加流动性交易需要补缺对称添加的代币来完成
pendingLiquidity.pendingInfoTitle: 您有待定中的添加流动性交易
pendingLiquidity.withdrawWarning: 取消交易将导致您在同一流动池里的现有LP被撤回，如果您不想提取您现有的LP，请选择完成。

addLiquidity.asymmetricPoolNotice: 您的资产在进入流动池后将被重新平衡。这意味着您将持有RUNE和您提供的代币双面 50：50 的风险。
addLiquidity.asymmetricPoolNotice0: 您的 %{depositAsset} 在进入流动池后将被重新平衡。这意味着您将持有RUNE和 %{asset} 双面 50：50 的风险。
addLiquidity.asymmetricPoolTip: 您即将以非对称添加方式入池。
addLiquidity.existingLpTipNotice: 您已持有此资产的LP，使用此钱包地址添加更多的LP将重置无常损失保护期，您是否确定要在此地址添加更多的LP？

liquidity.chainFeeTooltip: 用于提交使用 %{chain} 交易的燃料费
liquidity.gasFeeTooltip: 用于提交使用 THORChain 交易的燃料费
liquidity.poolShareTooltip: 提供流动性后，您流动池占比的预估百分比
liquidity.tip: 流动性提供者从所有交易中赚取与他们在流动池中的份额成比例0.25%的费用。此费用是实时累积入流动池中，您可以通过提取您的流动性来领取。

multisig.addMembersDescription: Add members (e.g wallets of your teammates)
multisig.transationDetailsTooltip: This will not be processed until all chosen members have signed and the transaction has been broadcast.
multisig.confirmWalletRemoval: Please confirm you want to disconnect this wallet.
multisig.connectThorchainWallet: Connect your THORChain wallet (currently Keystore only) to retrieve your Public Key.
multisig.signersTooltip: Specify how many members must sign before a transaction is executed. In general, the more signers required, the more your THORSafe is.
multisig.createMultisigDescription: Create a new THORSafe multi-sig wallet that is managed by two or more members. You will be required to pay a network fee and initial $RUNE deposit to generate your new THORSafe.
multisig.createMultisigPubKeyInfo: You will need your THORChain wallet’s Public Key in order to create a new THORSafe.
multisig.publicKeyInfo: You will need Public Keys for each member’s THORChain wallet in order to create a new THORSafe.
multisig.createMultisigStart: Once you have Public Keys of all members you are ready to create a new THORSafe.
multisig.importMultisigDescription: Access an existing THORSafe by importing the wallet JSON file.
multisig.importMultisigSecondDescription: It is safe to share this file with your fellow THORSafe members.
multisig.connectThorchainCurrentlyKeystore: Connect your THORChain wallet (currently Keystore only):
multisig.enterMultisigWalletName: Enter a name of the multi-sig wallet
multisig.existingMultisigDescription: Already have a THORChain multi-sig wallet? Easily access it by entering your THORChain (RUNE) Address. Only members of the multi-sig wallet will be able to sign transactions.
multisig.exportError: Failed to export your wallet to a file
multisig.exportTooltip: Export wallet info to a file
multisig.importTransactionDescription: Import, sign and/ or broadcast an existing transaction.
multisig.incorrectSignatures: At least one of signatures is invalid.
multisig.name: Name
multisig.nameYourMultisigWallet: Let's give your new multi-sig wallet an address. This name is stored locally and will never be shared by THORSwap or any third parties.
multisig.newTransactionDescription: Once a transaction is created, it can be signed by members of the THORSafe, and then broadcast.
multisig.pasteSignature: Please, paste your signature generated by your CLI here.
multisig.pasteSignatureInfo: Please, paste your signature generated by your CLI. Click 'Submit Signature' to submit signature.
multisig.requiredMember: You need at least 2 wallet members
multisig.setMultisigSigners: Set Multi-sig signers for how many people must sign transactions in order to be executed successfully.
multisig.txSignaturesInfo: The required number of signatures must be met before the transaction can be ready for broadcast.
multisig.addYourSignatureInfo: Connect your THORChain Wallet (currently Keystore only) to sign this transaction. Please make sure you are also connected to the correct THORSafe for this transaction.
multisig.importSignatureInfo: If you have signature from other member you can import it below.
multisig.exportTxInfo: Export transaction data along with current signatures as a JSON file and pass it on to the next signer before broadcasting.
multisig.broadcastTxInfo: You have all required signatures and transaction can be broadcasted.
multisig.broadcastTxInfoBlocked: You do not have all required signatures to broadcast this transaction. Pass on the transaction JSON file one at a time until all required members have completed signing.
multisig.selectTxJsonFile: Import Transaction JSON file to continue signing process.
multisig.depositSymWarning: THORSafe can deposit only RUNE side. You need to deposit asset side in a separate transaction.
multisig.notActiveAccount: Your THORSafe is not yet active, make an initial $RUNE deposit to complete setup.
multisig.createdWalletAddress: Your THORSafe has been created. You can view its address below:
multisig.exportWalletInfoToFile: Export THORSafe JSON file to share with fellow members and connect for future use
multisig.addMembersToWallet: Add members to your new THORSafe. You will need their public keys - yours has been prefilled. NOTE: the order of members matter, changing the order will result in a new THORSafe address. This does not affect signing order.
multisig.nameYourWalletOptionaly: (Optional) Name your new THORSafe. This name is for personal records and stored locally - it is not shared with THORSwap or any third parties.
multisig.thorSafeInfo: You’re almost there! Review and activate your new THORSafe below
multisig.selectWalletJson: Select wallet json file and import info
multisig.selectMembesToSign: Choose signers for your new THORSafe multi-sig transaction.
multisig.allMembersNeedToSignTx: All members chosen must complete signing before the transaction can be broadcasted.
multisig.thorsafeDescription: THORSafe is a Multi-sig Wallet interface for secure management of THORChain Assets.
multisig.thorsafeSecondDescription: Drastically improve your DeFi Security by creating and managing THORChain multi-sig wallets on THORSwap. THORSafe reduces dependency on one person or device, and can be used for enhanced self-custody, group decision making/ node operations/ liquidity pooling, escrow transactions, dead man's switch, and much more.
multisig.incorrectTxCreateConfig: Incorrect txCreate config or missing txCreate context provider
multisig.exportTxWithSignaturesTooltip: You must do this one at a time, passing the JSON file to the next member after you have signed.
multisig.thorsafeFileTooltip: This is different from the THORSafe JSON file. You would have received this from other designated signees of the transaction.
multisig.membersTooltip: Your THORSafe should have two or more members, add more by importing their Wallet Private Key.

staking.tcStakingDesc: 在 THORChain 提供 THOR-RUNE 流动性

stakingVThor.apyTip: 此溢率是估值，可能会有波动。
stakingVThor.maximizeYield: 质押 THOR 获取 vTHOR 让奖励最大化
stakingVThor.stakeInfo:
当您质押 $THOR（ERC-20）时，您将收到 $vTHOR：一个可转移锁仓代币，代表著您的质押头寸。

$vTHOR可以自动复利，您将获得 (1) 社群激励 与 (2) THORSwap 收入 75% 的反利作为奖励。

当您解除 $THOR 质押时，您将获得按照THOR : vTHOR 比例对等的资产和奖励。
stakingVThor.stakeInfoDescription: 您的 $THOR 尚在V1合约质押。请解除并转移至 $vTHOR 质押合约。
stakingVThor.stakeInfoTitle: 您的 $THOR 正在V1合约质押
stakingVThor.stakeVThorSubtitle: 质押 THOR 获取奖励和交易费折扣
stakingVThor.stakeVThorTitle: 质押 THOR 获取 vTHOR
stakingVThor.totalThorTip: 可领取的 THOR (质押+奖励) 总额

stats.totalRUNETooltip: RUNE 总流动性 / 最大的RUNE流动资金上限。

thorname.thornameInfo: THORName (内测）: 注册和管理钱包地址（交易/ 转让功能正在开发中）。THORName 不区分大小写，限制在30个字符，包括a-Z，所有数字0-9和-_+。
